channel.title: Api on GBIF Data Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Api on GBIF Data Blog

item.title: (Almost) everything you want to know about the GBIF Species API
item.description: Today, we are talking about the GBIF Species API. Although you might not use it directly, you probably encountered it while using the GBIF web portal: Typing a scientific name in the GBIF Occurrence search. Seeing a “Taxon Match Fuzzy” flag. Using the Species Name matching tool. This API is what allow us to navigate through the names available on GBIF. I will try to avoid repeating what you can already find in its documentation.
